txt.en: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, bats have descended onto the Torrent-spires in the darkness of the night….\n\nYour mission is to remove the bats who have descended upon Zarkul-sulûn.
You have been tasked with removing the bats who have descended upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have come back from Zarkul-sulûn. There are bats everywhere! This can not stand! We must return to the Zarkul-sulûn and expel these winged beasts!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to remove the bats who have descended upon Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Zarkul-sulûn.
'Well done! With the bats driven away by your quick thinking, Zarkul-sulûn may soon be ours! We can't have vicious bats swarming us in the heat of battle!'
